tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: One Big Boat
programme.desc: When a Naval Academy sailing team gets caught in a squall and a team member drowns, Mac and Turner must determine if their driven commander willingly put his crew at risk.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Death At The Mosque
programme.desc: Vukovic is sent to Iraq to defend a Marine who was caught on tape killing a seemingly innocent Iraqi civilian.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Dream Team
programme.desc: A sailor dies during a fight aboard a ship at sea; Bud discovers the explanation. Mattie wakes up and talks. The general announces a reorganization, orders, and a promotion.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Pilot, Part 1 & 2
programme.desc: A woman radar-intercept officer (RIO) disappears at night from an aircraft carrier in the Adriatic Sea. Two JAG lawyers, Lt. Harm Rabb and Lt. Caitlin Pike, investigate and solve. Harm, a former Naval aviator, unexpectedly becomes a hero.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Shadow
programme.desc: A civilian tech rep aboard a submarine seizes control of an experimental torpedo after its launch during an exercise.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Tech, Drugs, and Rock 'n Roll
programme.desc: Walter's attempt to "normalize" goes horribly wrong when a nefarious virus is uploaded to his computer.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Crazy Train
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must stop a sabotaged runaway subway train with Paige and Ralph on board. Also, in his attempt to impress Happy, Toby has his first boxing match.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Area 51
programme.desc: To help fund Walter's research into saving his sister's life, Team Scorpion takes a lucrative job for the CIA to find a top-secret aircraft in the mysterious Area 51.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: US vs. UN vs. UK
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is blackmailed to break into the United Nations to assist in the assassination of a menacing arms dealer.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Arrivals And Departures
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion and Walter's parents visit Megan in the hospital as her health deteriorates, they are quarantined after a deadly fungus outbreak threatens to infect everyone.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: The Old College Try
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover at a university to find a hacker who infiltrates the Federal Reserve and threatens to collapse the world economy.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Dov and Gail work together under Swarek’s expert tutelage in a stake-out operation to stop an Asian gang from killing a snitch.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Laid Plans
programme.desc: 15 Division’s hunt for an armed robber leads them to the scene of a horrible car accident. While Andy deals with a woman pinned in her car, the other officers must track and apprehend the fugitive.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Little Faith
programme.desc: When Traci and Andy are sent out on an undercover training exercise, they stumble upon a young woman who is about to die of an overdose. Meanwhile, Dov finds himself on a “ride-along” with a drug dealer and old friend of his deceased brother.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: On The Double
programme.desc: When Gail Peck’s uniform is stolen, the rookies go after a vigilante who is impersonating a police officer. Meanwhile, Swarek’s off the grid, trying to get information out of former crime enforcer Jamie Brennan.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: God’s Good Grace
programme.desc: While Swarek is brutally interrogated by Jamie Brennan in the basement of a Pickering farmhouse, the rookies help Andy solve a mystery that may reveal Swarek’s location.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: With the team on edge, they explore deeper into the darkness of this incredible place of mystery and secrets. Is the feeling of unease just in their minds or is something about to reveal itself.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The team are still spread thinly across this huge location and without the safety of numbers some of the investigators seem easy prey.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oakwell House
programme.desc: The team investigate Oakwell House near Leeds, which was built by ancestors of Fred Batt. In 1684, William Batt returned unexpectedly from a trip to London but vanished leaving a bloody footprint. A demon dog has been seen in the grounds.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Tatton Hall
programme.desc: Something about Tatton Old Hall keeps bringing the Most Haunted team back. Something happens that stops two of the team entering, a poltergeist causes confusion and the team get a clear voice from beyond the veil.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Tivoli Venue
programme.desc: A well-known venue for accomplished as well as up and coming bands The Tivoli Venue boasts many a ghost. In this episode one of the team gets a warning from the other side that reduces them to tears and something seems to be stalking the team.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Soldier's Story
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Tapsheads to Derby, Connecticut to investigate one of the country's oldest Opera houses, the Sterling Opera House.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Alcatraz
programme.desc: For the 100thepisode of Ghost Hunters, the team is allowed private access to Alcatraz Island, a dream come true for paranormal teams.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Betsy Ross House
programme.desc: A family living in a Revolutionary War era house in Pennsylvania fears for their child and urgently calls on the TAPS team for help.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.sub-title: The Knight, Death and the Devil
programme.desc: Dylan attempts to liberate a fleet of captured ships, but the fleet isn't sure it wants to be liberated. Their AIs fear that new captains will enslave them.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Immaculate Perception
programme.desc: Genites attack Tyr's wife and colony.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Tunnel at the End of the Light
programme.desc: With fifty parties on board, Dylan hosts the signing of the New Commonwealth charter, but soon discovers there are intruders intent on stopping the signing.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka and Tyr are taken over by the energy from a dimensional tunnel. Dylan, Trance and Harper must save them before they destroy the ship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Shards of Rimni
programme.desc: Dylan is framed for murder and must clear his name while finding the pieces of a vase said to grant the owner the "blessings of the cosmos.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.43
programme.desc: Teenager steals mother's checkbook, buys car; parents sue custom shop owner/Woman sues ex-lover for leaving her for mother of his child; he claims bitterness, she alleges owed money.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.150
programme.desc: Man denies owing ex and her mother for car down payment. Accuses ex-lover of sending inappropriate emails about sex to his new girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.63
programme.desc: Woman locks daughter out, sues for unpaid rent; daughter countersues for damages citing illegal eviction. Man denies owing ex-girlfriend for uninsured motorcycle he totaled, despite $17,000 pay-off amount left on co-signed vehicle.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.101
programme.desc: Former best friends fight over utility bills, protective orders and alleged harassment/A man sues his child’s former best friend for the cost to haul her stuff away and for filing a restraining order.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.176
programme.desc: Single mother bails Internet acquaintance out of jail, discovers he has girlfriend and baby. He countersues, alleging she stalked him. Angry neighbor smashes deliveryman's car window with lawn chair for driving too fast.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.237
programme.desc: A 'doctored' contract complicates a case about a ruined wedding reception due to heat. Feuding teenagers and parents battle over liability in a wrecked car incident after a night of drinking.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.4
programme.desc: Pounding on and damaging a car in a fit of rage is a claim denied by\t\t\t\r\na teenager accused of vandalism by his ex-girlfriend/A man sues his ex-girlfriend for payments and damages to a car he was letting her borrow.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.7
programme.desc: Unwed parents fight over jail time, restraining order, and engagement ring/Man sues friend for used motorcycle balance; friend alleges lemon.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.77
programme.desc: A 16-year-old claims a schoolmate keyed her car; the accused classmate denies all charges/A 12-year-old girl, who is entrusted with a valuable Rolex chain, makes the mistake of loaning it to a classmate; he claims he lost it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.16
programme.desc: An attempt to serve divorce papers to a man and his new girlfriend allegedly ends in an act of vandalism and assault.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.167
programme.desc: Woman claims ex-husband owes $16k in child support arrears; he sues for overpayment. Man sues alleged bar assailant; defendant claims Good Samaritan role.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants must find keys for lockers containing various cuts of steak, then prepare a delicious dish in under 35 minutes. Dinner service sees the return of steak night.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay puts aspiring chefs through a series of gruelling challenges. Pairs of contestants battle it out in the `Taste It and Make It' challenge, with the winning duo visiting the Queen Mary ocean liner.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The top five chefs prepare a unique and elegant small-plate dish in under 45 minutes for people attending a private symphony performance, for which the challenge winner earns a private helicopter tour of Los Angeles.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs who prepare the best vegetarian dish win a parasailing experience and a slap up meal. Emotions run high as the hopefuls receive a visit from their friends and family.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The 14th series of Gordon Ramsay's fiercely fought chef challenge concludes. The top two chefs visit previous winner Christina Wilson in Las Vegas for some motivation, before preparing five dishes to be judged by top chefs.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Cement Mixer
programme.desc: When a debtor and his friends resort to baseball bats, chaos erupts, and Lou, Lyndah, and Sonia fight not only with them but also with each other. Down in Texas, Matt and Froy wait to clear up Froy's warrant and get in way over their heads working...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Couple of Yups/Bottled Feelings/A Screw Loose
programme.sub-title: Couple of Yups/Bottled Feelings/A Screw Loose
programme.desc: First, Frankie and Lyndah find themselves in a fancy neighborhood, dealing with a pair of uptight yuppies with well-coordinated clothes and well-coordinated attacks. Then Lyndah goes wild when a truck-driving debtor gets physical with Sonia.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Mess with Texas
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Frankie'd Up Beyond All Recognition
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home. Back in LA, Frankie's wild antics jeopardize a repo and push Lyndah to her breaking...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Monumental Changes
programme.desc: Matt and Froy set out to repo a truck from a wealthy Texan, but their mission backfires when the Sheriff arrives with a new arrest warrant that will send Froy away for good.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Adapt, Improvise, and Overcome
programme.desc: Lou takes his new guys on their very first repo but, when the debtors attack with chainsaws, Ronnie and Carlos are left to fend for themselves.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Deep Dish Disaster
programme.desc: Lou plans an elaborate sting operation to infiltrate a cult, but everything goes awry when the new guys aren't prepared and Matt is left picking up the pieces.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Traffic Jammin'
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah confront a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Repo Arigato, Mr. Roboto
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah confront a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Inane Clown Posse
programme.desc: Froy and Matt have to wrangle with some angry clowns when they try to repossess a bouncy castle. Meanwhile, Lou and Sonia lose patience with a debtor over a recycling truck.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Role Play
programme.desc: Jeff promises to take Audrey to an upmarket and very popular restaurant but forgets to book a table. Determined to dine there, he hatches a plan to get in by claiming that a last-minute reservation is needed for a celebrity.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Catering
programme.desc: Brenda enlists Jeff and Audrey's help when she does the catering for an event at Columbia University. While waitressing, Audrey tries to fit in with the guests, only to discover that they are more impressed with Jeff's bartending skills.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Cooking Class
programme.desc: The couples attempt to enjoy recreational cooking classes together, but Jeff and Adam can't keep their competitive nature out of the kitchen. Russell doesn't notice how disturbingly similar his new girlfriend is to Timmy.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Unpleasant Surprises
programme.desc: When Jennifer learns that the guys have nothing planned for Adam's last weekend as a bachelor, she plans a party weekend. Things don't go as planned, however, so Jeff, Russell, and Timmy must improvise.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Timmy Quits
programme.desc: Audrey has always had suspicions that Jeff's old college friend Heidi harbours romantic feelings for him, so Jeff invites Heidi over to prove that this was never the case.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Wee Problem
programme.desc: Jeff does his best to make a heavily pregnant Brenda laugh when he discovers that she has a `wee problem' due to her condition, but his antics cause her waters to break. Meanwhile, Adam annoys Audrey with his non-stop chatter during a spa visit.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 100th
programme.desc: Brenda goes into labor on Jen and Adam's wedding day, but Jeff has reservations about being in the delivery room. Adam persuades Jen to make some alternative arrangements for their marriage ceremony.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rules of Engagement: Pilot
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer are a 20-something couple who have gotten engaged and moving in together after just seven months of dating. Meanwhile, their neighbors Jeff and Audrey who have been married for twelve years try to set a good example.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Birthday Deal
programme.desc: Though he's unhappy that Audrey spent more than usual for his birthday party, Jeff wants to stay on her good side to ensure he gets his yearly birthday deal. Though Jeff won't reveal the 'deal.'.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: After Adam has too many restless nights sleeping in Jennifer’s small bed, he brings home the bed he shared with his ex-girlfriend which causes a fight and leads them tossing out all memories of past relationships.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Business
programme.desc: Dog and the Chapman clan start their hunt today with another well-established bail bonding family. As Dog's fame has grown, so have his responsibilities.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Felons Interrupted
programme.desc: Dog is confronted with two alleged felons in crisis. Family and friends of these bondees are convinced that they are getting into further trouble while awaiting trial, so Dog and the posse have to bring these men back to jail.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Let It Snow
programme.desc: Christopher is barely 21, already has a history of domestic abuse and assault, and is facing major time in a room without a view. This hunt won't be easy for Dog - the leads are few, informers and family are not forthcoming.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rush from Judgment
programme.desc: Facing hard time for forging checks, Melissa pulled a vanishing act at her sentencing hearing, bolting from the courthouse in broad daylight. Lucky for her bondsman, Dog and his posse are in Colorado and ready to help.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Burn & Return
programme.desc: Dog is busy. First, he's after a fugitive who is allegedly an expert in the game of "burn and return"- shoplifting goods to return them for cash refunds. But he's not easy to track.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Going after two fugitives in one day is tough enough without the facing Colorado's notoriously unpredictable weather. Today, it's the threat of severe thunderstorms, hail and area wide tornado warnings.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Money
programme.desc: It hurts Dog to see people who after years of walking the straight and narrow, suddenly lose their way. But today's case is a member of the law enforcement community who has recently gone astray, and that truly troubles the Dog.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Reality Check
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Decent Proposal
programme.desc: On a trip to New York, Jase's son Reed proposes to his girlfriend, which inspires his father to fan the flames of romance back home with Missy. Meanwhile, Sadie asks Willie to be a guest lecturer at her business class.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Father Knows Pest
programme.desc: The tables are turned when the HOA comes to Jase for help to rid the neighborhood of a menacing beaver. Little Will has just gotten his learner's permit, and Willie and Si argue over which of them is the better driving instructor.(n)

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: Beneath the icy surface, survivors of Colony Seven struggle as food supplies dwindle and temperatures drop. Plagued by illness, the colonists suspect the worst when they mysteriously lose contact with Colony Five, the only other known settlement.(n)

programme.title: Earthling
programme.desc: After a mysterious atmospheric event, a small group of people wake up to realize that their entire lives have been a lie. They are in fact aliens disguised as humans. Now they have to make a choice. Live amongst men, or try to find a way back home.(n)

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: A series of uncanny déjà vu events force a man to re-examine his tragic past, memory, instinct, and future.(n)

programme.title: A Most Violent Year
programme.desc: In 1981 NYC, an immigrant (Oscar Isaac) and his family try to expand their business as rampant violence and corruption drag them in and threaten to destroy all they have built.(n)

programme.title: Traffic
programme.desc: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is an addict.(n)

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: Craig Fairbrass stars as Lex, who has been told that his daughter has died in LA. However, he finds that the body isn't his daughter, and that an internet fraudster has her hostage. Lex wreaks havoc through the streets of LA trying to find her.(n)

programme.title: Recoil
programme.desc: A cop turns vigilante after his family is murdered, exacting vengeance on the killers - and then on all criminals who have slipped through the system.(n)

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: A brilliant thief has masterminded a series of high-stake bank heists, and for two detectives, the only hope for survival is finding an order to the chaos.(n)

programme.title: Christmas in Mississippi
programme.desc: Photographer Holly returns to Gulfport, Mississippi for Christmas. Their traditional holiday light show has been revived again since a hurricane struck five years earlier. She is shocked to learn the festival is run by her high school sweetheart, Mike.(n)

programme.title: A Country Christmas Story
programme.desc: Musical icon and multiple Grammy Award winner Dolly Parton and Grammy Award nominated R&B singer and producer Brian McKnight star in this Lifetime Original Movie.(n)

programme.title: Holiday Joy
programme.desc: A shy high school student's Christmas wish comes true only it isn't exactly as wonderful as she'd hoped.(n)

programme.title: A Teacher's Crime
programme.desc: Carrie is an attractive and ambitious high-school teacher, who gets close to one of her students, Jeremy. Jeremy is a good kid, but he lives with his ex-con uncle Bill. When Bill finds out about their friendship, he blackmails her.(n)

programme.title: Lost Behind Bars
programme.desc: A woman author travels to a small Oregon town to research her latest book - the story of a crime committed by a young man who's now sitting on death row. As she digs for the facts, it soon becomes clear that the wrong person has been convicted.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: A Crime Of Passion
programme.desc: Freddie has everything--a gorgeous new husband and half ownership of a winery. But when her business partner's wife is murdered, Freddi suspects her partner's new love.(n)

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali (Will Smith) battles Sonny Liston, Joe Frazier and George Foreman and raises controversy outside the ring.(n)

programme.title: Stronger
programme.desc: Jeff Bauman loses both of his legs when two bombs explode during the Boston Marathon on April 15, 2013. With unwavering support from his family and girlfriend, Bauman embarks on a long and heroic journey to physical and emotional rehabilitation.(n)

programme.title: Ballad of Death Valley: Ballad of Death Valley
programme.desc: An 'angel-faced' gunfighter is tasked with infiltrating a ranch overrun by Mexican bandits and saving their hostages, including the fiancée of the local sheriff.(n)

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: G.W. McLintock is a man with a reputation as wide as the desert, is as wealthy as any man could wish to be and is about to fall into trouble deeper than the Grand Canyon. Starring: John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Patrick Wayne.(n)

programme.title: Outlaws And Angels
programme.desc: When outlaws invade the home of a seemingly innocent, frontier family, an unexpected game of cat and mouse ensues. This leads to seduction, and ultimately bloody revenge. Starring: Chad Michael Murray, Francesca Eastwood, Luke Wilson.(n)

programme.title: The Nutcracker
programme.desc: In 1920s Vienna, lonely Mary receives a nutcracker doll from her Uncle Albert. On Christmas Eve, her imagination brings it to life as "NC," leading her on a perilous journey against the Rat King's plot to overthrow humanity.(n)

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: A heart-wrenching drama starring Academy Award Winners Octavia Spencer and Kevin Costner. When Elliot is left to care for his granddaughter Eloise by himself, Eloise’s paternal grandmother seeks custody, drawing them into a long and uncertain battle.(n)

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: A raven-haired enchantress, Cassie Nightingale, mysteriously moves into the local haunted mansion, 'Grey House', and seems to change her neighbors lives using a hint of magic causing many to think she’s a witch.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Barney Thomson
programme.desc: Barney Thompson is a downtrodden barber who comically manages to become an unlikely serial killer, whilst attempting to evade a determined detective.(n)

programme.title: The Hippopotamus
programme.desc: Charming comedy based on the best-selling novel by Stephen Fry. A disgraced poet investigates a series of unexplained miracles.(n)

programme.title: Bachelor of Hearts
programme.desc: A German exchange student has girl troubles while studying at Cambridge, as the annual May Ball approaches.(n)

programme.title: Doctor in Love
programme.desc: A doctor falls in love with a nurse while undergoing treatment at his own hospital. When his stand-in breaks his leg and is replaced by a female doctor, he falls for her as well.(n)

programme.title: Doctor in the House
programme.desc: Simon Sparrow begins medical school in London at St Swithin's Hospital, and moves into an apartment with roommates. A series of challenges and shenanigans takes place during their next five years at medical school.(n)

programme.title: Don't Ever Leave Me
programme.desc: Jack's grandfather Harry comes out of prison and stays with him in his mews flat.(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Ronette is attacked in her hospital bed by an unseen person. Jean Renault, brother of Jacques and Bernard, plans to blackmail Ben Horne for the release of Audrey. Donna meets with Harold Smith, a shut-in who had befriended Laura.(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Leland confesses to killing Jacques Renault. Andy wants to take a new sperm count test. Rumor spreads that a food critic is coming to Twin Peaks. Jean asks Ben to set a trap for Cooper in exchange for Audrey's life.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Special Service
programme.desc: A man finds that his life has been on TV for the past five years.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Her Pilgrim Soul/I of Newton
programme.desc: Two scientists named Kevin and Daniel are experimenting with a holographic device/ A mathematics professor accidentally makes a bargain with the devil and has to figure a way out.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Shatterday/A Little Peace and Quiet
programme.desc: A man named Peter Jay Novins accidentally dials his home phone number, and it's answered by Peter Jay Novins/A harried housewife finds a medallion that gives her the power to freeze time.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Wingman
programme.desc: Will is getting ready for his big date with Abby while Henry prepares for a romantic night out with Erika. When the two meet in the hallway, they realize that they have made the same reservation for the same restaurant and the same time.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Awakening
programme.desc: During an excursion to East Africa to investigate a former Praxian stronghold, Magnus and Tesla are surprised to find a secret chamber.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Normandy
programme.desc: In a look back to 1944 and World War II, Magnus has learned of a new weather controlling device developed by the Nazis and intended to be deployed against the approaching allied armada.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Carentan
programme.desc: The Sanctuary receives reports that several people have gone missing, all around the town of Carentan in the Normandy region of France.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: Meet Helen and Will: neighbors on a tree-lined, suburban street. Helen lives alone, dislikes her neighbor’s dog and is a talented painter.(n)
